{"blocks":[{"key":"3ghl4","text":"Counterstain the slides with methylgreen (Sigma), dehydrate with graded alcohols, clear with xylenes, and cover the slides using cover slipps with cytoseal 60 (Fisher Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
